full_summary:
**Self-Inking Custom Date Stamps Tender**

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Summary:**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking a supplier to provide custom self-inking date stamps and related products and services on a fixed-term contract. The contract will have a duration of two years with three one-year options to extend. The contract will be valued at $ [insert amount].

**Background:**

The CRA requires a bulk order of self-inking date stamps to be delivered to a single location in Ottawa, Ontario, as well as new date stamps, replacement pads, and ink refills to be supplied and delivered on an as-needed basis to multiple CRA locations across Canada.

**Eligibility Criteria:**

To be eligible, suppliers must meet the criteria outlined in the RFP document and hold a valid membership in the Ariba Network (AN). Suppliers must also be members of one or more of the trade agreements listed in section 4 of this document.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The CRA will evaluate bids based on a combination of technical merit and price. The highest-ranked responsive bidder will be selected for award.

**Submission Requirements:**

Bids must be submitted to the CRA via the Connect service, with an email sent to the Bid Receiving Unit requesting to open a conversation. The email must include the bid solicitation number and the names and e-mail addresses of all participants in the conversation.

**Key Dates:**

* RFP document available: October 26, 2022
* Bid submission deadline: December 5, 2022 at 2:00 pm EST

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement

**Tender Documents:**

The RFP document and supporting information can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website.

**Contact Information:**
